countdowntimer

Class CountDownTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • countdowntimer.CountDownTimer

  • public class CountDownTimer
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores basic information for counting down to a certain point Created by Andrew on 9/4/15.

        public CountDownTimer(java.lang.String timeString)
        Constructs a CountDownTimer based on a string
        Parameters:
        timeString - A string that can be in one of the following formats: - hh:mm:ss - mm:ss (Will set hh to zero) - ss (Will set mm, hh to zero) - "" (Will set all to zero)
